PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-08062015-06-11TC,  LPA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Laurentian Pilotage Authority Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the LAURENTIAN PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS in order for the Authority to (1) improve the efficiency of its services by authorizing pilotage licence holders for District No. 1 who work in the Trois-Rivières-–Montréal area, excluding the Harbour of Montreal, to now work in the Harbour of Montreal; and (2) increase the number of pilots who are able to provide services, thereby avoiding delays in ship movements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0146 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
